item.author: cpw
item.title: Hello Gigaherz
item.summary: Hi Gigaherz This is a post purely from the github web editor. I apparently can’t use hugo shortcodes, but i can totally just smack together a basic post. Look I even have some basic formatting! System.out.println("I can even put java snippets in!"); Not such a big hardship to use the GitHub web editor. Just copy the front matter, and edit the Date field.

item.author: Curle
item.title: Curletest
item.summary: okay hear me out what if forge had a blog where we can post things and get in touch with the community and update people on what’s happening with the project we could use it as a central place to post updates that happen to forge and it can be mirrored to Discord and Twitter as part of FUN we can also use it for personal things related to the project;
